original_title: Sinong Lumikha ng Yoyo? Sinong Lumikha ng Moon Buggy?
overview: Stuck in the German lands of “Yodelburg,” our hero Kidlat dreams of space and muses on humanity’s endless capacity for creativity, whether on the moon or at home in the Philippines. A delightful, self-proclaimed “third-world space spectacle.”
title: Who Invented the Yoyo? Who Invented the Moon Buggy?
